author: aldcroft
description: Python isn't only for astronomy...For any hardware hackers out there this looks way cool.  Like Arduino, but 25 timesfaster and runs linux and Python natively with NumPy and SciPypre-installed:http://rascalmicro.com/http://www.engadget.com/2012/06/13/rascal-micro-hands-on-video/
title: Rascal: Arduino on steroids
